title: #293: Naomi Gibson Interview - Part Three
description:
We finish our conversation with Naomi Gibson to hear her first hand account of what it was like inside the NXIVM cult. Naomi talks about visiting the main NXIVM campus in Albany and what she observed there. She also talks about the Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (or Syndrome) she believes her family suffered after their experience in the Children of God cult.

You can also see Naomi in the STARZ documentary series “Seduced: Inside the NXVIM Cult”.

#hernameisNaomiGibson

#victimsmatter

#CoerciveControl

#jness

#seduced

#insidethenxivmcult

#STARZ
